results.content: A great way to learn more about excel except that it will be better if you could provide a downloadable presentation wherein we can go back from time to time to review and analyze. Another thing is, the sound is poor.
results.content_html: A great way to learn more about excel except that it will be better if you could provide a downloadable presentation wherein we can go back from time to time to review and analyze. Another thing is, the sound is poor.

results.content:
Watching the guy work while he was talking and showing us stuff was a great
way to see processes and remember them later. With the ability to pause, I could also stop and update some of my existing spreadsheets.
results.content_html:
Watching the guy work while he was talking and showing us stuff was a great
way to see processes and remember them later. With the ability to pause, I could also stop and update some of my existing spreadsheets.

results.content: Lots of info. Like the sorting button. Information is good. But batting averages is something I am not sure I care about so I think I am having to pay more attention to figure out other ways to apply the information.
results.content_html: Lots of info. Like the sorting button. Information is good. But batting averages is something I am not sure I care about so I think I am having to pay more attention to figure out other ways to apply the information.

results.content: It wouldn't been nice to have had the sheets provided, so that I wouldn't have to manually type in the data in the cells in order to do what was shown
results.content_html: It wouldn't been nice to have had the sheets provided, so that I wouldn't have to manually type in the data in the cells in order to do what was shown

results.content: I like the course very much, it helps to de-dust basics, it seems a little outdated for never versions of excel, and I have a bit problem with audio volume, could you make it a bit louder?:) Overall, great course, thanks a bunch:)

results.content: Amazing. If u provide the summary note of each class, it will be very useful. But the sound is very low in many clips

results.content: Shortcuts to excel formula is missing in majoriety. for example- Pivot AlTDPP is short cut but every time it is going on function keys to explain.

results.content: This is an excellent series for those who have been timid about learning Excel - raising my hand!

results.content: very informative and can be used on my daily excel report, thank you.

results.content: I am really glad that i enrolled myself for this course ,the overall content and explanation is fantastic ,presentation i quiet fascinating .fully satisfied

results.content: poor sound quality. It is too quiet to hear,  I have to adjust the volume all the way up. after a few minutes it gets loud, then i turn it down. Then it is too soft again. time is spent over playing with the volume rather than learning.
